website_summaries.verdict: This utilitarian pick allows users supreme efficiency by offering an elegant cork board alongside helpful home features.
pros: Small cork board for notes and pictures
Board attached to a mail center with 5 key hooks
Perfect to hang near door for family organization

customer_reviews.title: Product mount brackets snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this key holder and just now tried installing it. With no weights on it at all, one of the mount brackets snapped off. How????? It looks like the product has weak cosmetic tack welds at the joints. You can see in the photo that the weld had no penetration into the metal I am returning mine for a refund. I don't want a replacement. Other than that the product looks good but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective with the "fabric" detached at one end.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and matches the decor of my apartment. It appears sturdy. Sadly though, it was defective. Look at the photo. This is the way it was, with part of the cover "fabric" unglued.
customer_reviews.author: Stef603

customer_reviews.title: NO, DONT DO IT.
customer_reviews.text: Well 3 days after install one tab broke on it and it became useless. I purchased Metal because I thought It’d last, I was Wrong. I would not recommend this product. I don’t see anything but an 800 number for support and didn’t get an answer there.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed and matches the decor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed and matches the decor. Did not use the mounting screws, used the 3M removable strips and held great. Fits in a small area but keeps the keys in one place instead of searching for them somewhere in the mess on the table. Quality is great for the price and looks and feels a higher quality. Would recommend this for anyone for a small nice place to keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: It looks very Nice but it has a Flimsy Attachment Method.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when installed - Nice combination of design elements and function. However, when installed per instructions, it is easy to bend the basket tray away from the wall. The two attachment tabs are not strong enough. It takes little force on the tray to bend it away from the wall. This unit needs another tab and holding screw at the inside top center of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Install in under 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was going to do something like this a long time ago, but never got to it, Well am now pimping up my house to get it for market, and thought this would be cute to have, so it arrived today, and broke out the cordless screwdriver and put it up, only took 5 minutes, but suggest u include wood screws, as most people will screw into the side of a kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking. The hooks are a bit smaller than I anticipated and the mail slot is shorter in height, but neither is significant enough to lose a star. It was super easy to hang up and looks great in my kitchen. I use the hooks to hang dog leashes so they are right next to the door (the hooks were clearly meant to hold keyrings, hence the smaller size. I can hook the leashes onto the hooks easily, but the bulk of our longer 1.5" width dog leashes doesn't fit as comfortably in the hook. We make it work though.) Overall I'm very happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great key rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack, it holds all of my car and motorcycle keys on the hooks, and it can fit my wallet, headphones, and 2 pairs of sunglasses on the top. I used the 2 screws to mount it on my wall and it feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Nifty!
customer_reviews.text: Now we almost never lose our keys. We hung this right by our front door so it gave us a home base for all our keys. This has helped so much! I no longer here my wife asking constantly, "where are my keys!!??" as she's late for work and running around frantic. My only wish is that it was larger, although we can fit standard letter envelopes in the bin, you can't fit anything larger unless you stand it up longways. I.e Manila envelopes and such. Super convenient and I recommend every household have something like this.
customer_reviews.author: onefastricerocket

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN FLAW! The BAR on the back PREVENTS a FLUSH WALL MOUNT
customer_reviews.text: The BAR on the back PREVENTS a FLUSH WALL MOUNT. It doesn't lay flat on the wall. Always looks like it's falling off the wall. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got had a broken piece where the screw holds it to the wall. Returned it for a replacement. It's not very sturdy, but I suppose it's only supposed to hold a little weight. The design is good, and it does look very nice once its installed. Be careful putting the screws in because the flaps the screws go through seem like they will snap off with a little pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my new key hook. We had a key box before but the lanyards would hang out of it and it looked awful and my family would leave stuff on the table when they got home like sunglasses, mail, etc. this has worked great. Keeps stuff off the table and fits all of our keys.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle1

customer_reviews.title: Great little purchase to keep our counters clean
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to put it up on the wall (I have no experience with actually drilling holes in my wall) but that's about my only complaint I have! I just decided to use a little nail that I didn't think would actually hold up but it has been about a month and we put mail in it and use all the little key hooks with no problems! Great little purchase to keep our counters clean.
customer_reviews.author: kristi carlson

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well designed and manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: No adhesion—two small screws securely mount it to any wall. Well designed and manufactured. I mounted two of them to hang the jackets we use every day. As you know, most jackets come with a small loop near the collar on the inside of the jacket so that works perfectly—jackets are quick to access and return—easy on/easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yanasak

customer_reviews.title: A decent Wall Mount letter holder
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount letter holder really looks great, decent construction, and easy to install. The only negative is that it could of had the screw slots on the top so that there would be less space between it and the wall. It's not been a problem for me but I can see it bothering some people. Overall, I am happy with the purchase - especially given the alternative products I was able to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks nice and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice and does what it is supposed to do, but I only gave it 3 Stars due to what I believe is poor mounting. It came with two screws that go into the wall at the base of the envelope holder. I have this thing tightened to the wall as much as possible, yet it still seems flimsy. The top of it leans slightly off the wall and doesn't sit flush, and that's without any envelopes in it (just keys hanging). If this thing was secured higher up on the unit, it would be 5 stars hands down. Til then, it's just OK til then.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mail and key!
customer_reviews.text: Super inexpensive and perfect for mail and keys! Looks like I spent more than I did on it. It comes with screws but I just put mine up with push pins and it holds perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, holds stuff and hangs well. Anchors well enough to even hang umbrellas and the occasional hoodie from the hooks. What else can you want in a thing like this?
customer_reviews.author: S. Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Missing bracket to hang
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute item, but it arrived in a defective state. It was missing the other bracket to put the nail thru to hang on my wall, rendering it useless and a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keep it for many years
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for many year. They still look like same as the first day I install it. It fit well on my wall and look good. Doesn't take a lot space. Only thing could improve is I hope it has more hooks, so I could hand more keys.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than pictured! I was actually surprised to see how small it is but I guess it will do. Uses nails so you might need a power tool
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and looks good matching my floors!!
customer_reviews.text: Its just as described and easy to install!!! Made a short whole with the drill, used the drywall anchors that comes with it and used the matching color screws. It doesn't move and holds all of my key sets!! We have obviously been hanging each key set owners, their masks!! It also fits long envelopes on its top horizontally which is pretty nice. Overall recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Hong

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could have used it....
customer_reviews.text: The piece that has the hole to attach the mail center to the wall broke off during installation, so dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works
customer_reviews.text: This mail and key rack looks as nice as it is in the pictures. Very elegant look. And works well - perfect size. Very easy to install - i saw one review complaining about not being able to get a hammer and nail under it - well, they obviously missed the screws that come with this (i almost missed it too when i emptied the package from amazon). It also comes with wall plugs in case you have a hard wall and need to drill. I didn't need it though (drywall). Any screwdriver can reach easily to fix the screws that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jubda

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one screw hole
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. The metal netting that hold the things was bent and it came with only one screw hole / mounting hole instead of two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. As mentioned in other reviews, the holder is big enough for a wallet and outgoing mail but not so big that it will become your second junk drawer. I didn't want to use drywall screws where I put it so I hung it with some picture hanging nails where the screw holes are then used a couple of cable-tie nails on the top part to keep it from sagging.
customer_reviews.author: K. lai

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my entryway ...exactly what the reviews said. The back is open so if there isn't anything in the basket then you can see the wall but it's not that big of a deal as I always have some sort of mail in the basket. I don't like putting holes in my wall so I used command strips and it's still holding strong. perfect sized hooks for keys..but if you're planning on hanging anything heavy don't. All in all, it's a good buy and I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: amrr14

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: It was easy for me to install this on my wall. It's been up for a couple months now and it's in use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Now I remember where my keys are! The little basket on top is very useful for our garage door opener and other things we need by the door.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to get organized. It is pretty cute, made very well. and the price was reasonable too. I hesitated to order it because I was afraid it might just be a piece of crap but it has exceeded my expectations and has helped rid some of the clutter. Now I don't have to walk around the house looking for my keys at the last minute. If you need to get organized, this is the item for you. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. MarinoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member's birthday. It looks great when hung up. It feels like it can hold a good amount of weight, but there are still some things we avoid putting in the basket (dog leash). Overall, amazing product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This mail holder is perfect. It's the perfect size (not bigger than it has to be), looks great, and was very easy to install. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan2020

customer_reviews.title: Finally a place to hold our mail and keys.
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a lot of space in our house to store our mail and keys. This gave us the perfect spot to do so; not that we have a lot of keys, it just gave me a place to not lose said keys. It's super easy to mount on your wall, and I don't believe I had to put it in the studs. Super sturdy and stylish, and can hold a lot of mail...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this key hook and the letter box. We are always loosing important mail - not anymore. And the hooks are super sturdy. We hang keys and dog leashes.
customer_reviews.author: m.shelley

customer_reviews.title: hung it with 2 nails and it looks awesome next to my door
customer_reviews.text: hung it with 2 nails and it looks awesome next to my door, hold letters with perfection, even keeps my keys in the same place ALL DAY. Its crazy, when I lay my keys down they always seem to wonder off but when I hang my keys on my letter box magically they don't go ANYWHERE. But seriously, for the price, you can't beat this product. This is high enough quality for my bachelor pad (low standards) BUT I would (and might even) buy another for my mom. (if moms like it....it must be good....right?)
customer_reviews.author: Justin B. Aldred

customer_reviews.title: i would have liked it a little nicer looking to match my other ...
customer_reviews.text: i haven't hung it yet. it might have given the dimensions & i didn't pay attention thinking if it's for letters & mail it's got to be at least so big, but it's not very deep & it's a little narrow for what i wanted. it looks ok, i would have liked it a little nicer looking to match my other new purchases to fix up my foyer for my upcoming putting my house on the market. it's ok. if that is all you are looking for, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Kid-proof
customer_reviews.text: I hung this by my door using two 3M hooks. This holds my mail and keys. I no longer have to search through my pockets and various rooms, in order to find my keys. Whenever I find someone's keys, I hang them on the keyholder. This is perfect if you have kids grabbing your keys.
customer_reviews.author: COA×4Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it breaks easily. I had to glue the screw holes back to the holder after it broke when I was screwing it to the wall. However, it still is cute and fits perfectly on my wall in my entry way!
customer_reviews.author: Summer K. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spots
customer_reviews.text: As described, comes with screws and it doesn’t look cheap. Happy with it. It’s about 10 inches wide, perfect of you have a tiny wall spot for your keys.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Boheme

customer_reviews.title: A little small, but still great
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing. For the low price, it looks pretty good. All of the hooks are in great condition. I didn't even use the wall mounts--just a couple of screws-- and it can hold quite a bit of weight. I have two sets of keys, my dog's leash, and about 6 prs of sunglasses hanging from it, as well as about 5 pieces of mail in the holder, and it hasn't moved at all. I'm pretty impressed with it, just wished the mail compartment was a littttle bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy for keeping by your door
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Works as advertised. The mounting screws are mandatory as there does not appear any way to mount it with double-side tape, which would have been a nice option depending on the surface you intend to mount it on. Handy for keeping things in that you intend to grab on the way out the door the next time. I end up putting my sunglasses in it all the time - beats losing or sitting on them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is very attractive and seems to be sturdy, though I am wary of some of the negative reviews as to whether it will hold up over time. I do not regret the purchase in any shape, way or form. It does exactly what I needed it to do, organize our keys, our outgoing mail, and we also use it to hold our cell phones so that we always know where they are. Brilliant. I'd recommend it. In one year's time, I will update the review and give it five stars if it maintains its structural integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty B. Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and holds mail very well
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and holds mail very well. It is also very attractive because the color is more of a darker brown with hints of golden tones. (darker than the picture shows but not much). It also has a basket weave texture that doesn't feel cheap. Great quality item. We have been using it for almost a year and it holds up in a 8 member home!
customer_reviews.author: D M Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect key/odds and ends organizer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! We placed this right inside our garage door as you enter the house. We are able to store the keys, sunglasses (2 standard pair of Oakley's fit standing up), wallets, and more inside the storage space. Used the drywall screws and then screwed the two spots in and it fits very solid!
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding our mask collection!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and is so convenient right next to the front door. Easy to grab a mask (and a dog leash too!). It is attractive and doesn't look cheap. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This looks very nice on the wall in our front door entry. Husband bolted it into the wall securely in the 2 spots provided on the back. It looks very nice with a picture we have in a brown frame, which is hung just above this. Hooks are holding several key rings without any problems. We don't use it for mail, but it is sturdy and could hold some letters. Might be nice for leaving a cell phone in.
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: A gem
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great, is sturdy, and looks quality. I do wish I there were two bins or even a bin without the accessory rack so I could separate mail, but this works. I will probably get a second set once I finish setting up an office space. As I am living in an apartment, I don't use the nails that come with this product, I have this held up by two plastic hook command strips.
customer_reviews.author: Alice in Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Sturdier Though
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive key holder. We have oil rubbed bronze fixtures throughout the house and this matches perfectly. I don't think it would hold a heavy item though. The screws are below the mid point of the unit and the top of the unit even tilts away from the wall. I could easily see this getting top heavy and since the metal around the screw holes is not the sturdiest, I could see it bending and falling over.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Great place to hang dog leashes and accessories. Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Smw

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again if I had more than one home.
customer_reviews.text: I don't give design stuff 5-stars, I just don't. But this one is everything it should be and nothing it shouldn't. It's not heavy in the least, just large enough to hold mail for three adults, it installs easily and comes with hardware--screws and anchors. Attachment holes are easy to get to, hooks are appropriately spaced, this is the perfect less-than-$15 key rack/mail holder. Not cheaply made at all!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sanderfer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Use Command hooks not strips.
customer_reviews.text: It really looks good although finishing is not perfect at the bottom. I didn't want to use nails so I used command strips but that didn't work. Then, I tried Command hooks and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nitesh S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hang dog leashes and earbuds for daily walks. Use top compartment for outgoing mail. Looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.author: CTH

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice, and a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, and well made. I am glad I bought it. I was expecting it to be really cheaply made, but I was pleasantly surprised. It's a perfect solution to the problem of mail lying around on the counter waiting to be read, or mailed. The hooks are really handy. I don't have a lot space, so things that do double-duty are always something I look for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Love this to hang keys and small purses. My children put the mail in it each day so nothing gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken screw
customer_reviews.text: the one screw came broken. wasnt able to use had to find one around the house to finish hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mail and key holder. My husband would always misplace his keys, but has not lost them since I hung this up. You wont regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed by the front door
customer_reviews.text: Small yet very useful... perfect size for small wall next to our front door. Looks clean and modern and is very functional
customer_reviews.author: An astute shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this item. The mail bin and the key hooks are great but the corkboard is thin and flimsy. I can't actually use it because the tacks go directly through to the wall. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne C Tewey

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: And the price was right too, its made well, that is exactly why I purchased this. Its sturdy, the keys hang fine, the metal hooks are not flimsy and theuppwer area is just right for out going mail, exactly as shown. Considering I buy less on amazon because of their new shipping, and pushing prime, and other things now, the items I do buy, Im very choosey and picky about and this I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: readingisfun

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally because i wanted something to hang my keys on because I am constantly misplacing them around the house. Now I know exactly where they are every time and I love how I can even put mail in it. It's even small enough to hang on a small section of my wall. It takes up very little room at all. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: No brains needed install... didn’t use wall anchors and have 6 sets of keys hanging with no issues. Very sleek and works as designed.
customer_reviews.author: RCGMCC

customer_reviews.title: Looks a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: It looks cheaper in person than it does online, specifically the outer liner of the basket portion, which has sort of a plastic brown wicker look (I selected the bronze). The metal framing and hooks don't look particularly cheap, though. Perhaps other designs look a bit less cheap than the bronze. If so, great; it has good potential for front-door organization.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keys and to hold other contents of my pockets
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the obvious use as a key rack and also somewhere to store my waller, chap stick & sunglasses etc to get them up off of the kitchen counter. It works great for its intended purpose but didn't get 4 or 5 stars because it doesn't sit flush with the wall and looks like it is leaning forward a little, have tried to bend the brackets so it sits flush but am afraid to bend them too much in case they break.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bainbridge

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Very decent, I waited over 1 year to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Peta

customer_reviews.title: I love this simple product
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple product: it holds tons of mail on top, it's super easy to install (two screws and you're done) and it's sturdy, fitting 5 rows of keys or hats or whatever else you want to hang in your foyer. And it's super cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made for your wall.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a much higher quality than I expected! I was afraid it might be flimsy, but it isn't. My nephew put it up for me (easy to install) and it holds keys, letters, and any other items. It's in my kitchen and looks nice in place. I bought this during the summer sale. I'm so glad I did. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brahms1545

customer_reviews.title: The hooks are sturdy, and the kids tend to let the garage ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to hold my keys & family tickets of all sorts. this product is solid and holds 8x10 paper tickets with room to move. The hooks are sturdy, and the kids tend to let the garage door slam and there is there is no movement from the holder. The holder is a beautiful copper color and is a solid weave. I highly recommend the product
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This looks pretty good, and it is reasonably priced. The back (not really pictured clearly on the product page) is open, but should sit against the wall. That is the only downside - nothing has fallen through on the one that I purchased yet, but I can see a gap where mail could fall through. Otherwise I'm quite pleased with this - it seems to be of reasonably decent quality for the money. Nice color too.
customer_reviews.author: Kinetica

customer_reviews.title: Functional and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Deducting a star from an otherwise great product because the wall mount piece had broken off on one of two items I ordered. I worked around the problem but manufacturer should think about quality around mounting handles. We use this for keys and sunglasses. I have partitioned the mail holder and repurposed to store sunglasses. Holds 5 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Magician

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basket could be a little taller
customer_reviews.text: LIKES: Perfect size for hanging by my door. Very sturdy. DISLIKES: The basket could be a little taller to better hold mail and magazines. The screw holes for mounting on the wall are in a challenging location behind the hooks so using a drill is a challenge unless you have the extender. Overall, I would still buy this product again if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara_F_2016

customer_reviews.title: The second one is for our dog and easily holds leashes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought. First one we use for keys, glasses, pool passes, etc. The second one is for our dog and easily holds leashes, brush, nail clippers, and extra poop bags. A great organizing tool. All metal and mounts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed in our household... it's awesome, now the first person that comes home and collects the mail doesn't need to tell each one that he or she got mail... he or she can just put it in the mount and when they arrive they can check the mail there... and you can put all the keys there too.
customer_reviews.author: El-Maz

customer_reviews.title: Great ptoduct
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's just what I was looking for! Perfect for next to my door. Sturdy and attractive. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Fairly easy to install. The only problem I had with it was that the holes for the nails are directly under the basket part so I wasn't able to get my drill lined up straight enough so I drilled upward a little rather than straight ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt.T

customer_reviews.title: Size doesn't matter
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I was a little disappointed because it was smaller than I expected but now that it's up and in use, I think it's just right. I haven't had mail that won't fit in it and the key hooks are very handy. It looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Chick

customer_reviews.title: Edited: Received bent, returning (fixed)
customer_reviews.text: Left most hook came bent, will be returning to get another one. Contacted customer service and they are replacing! Service made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for keys and mail.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we wanted it for. It holds multiple sets of keys and mail.
customer_reviews.author: Ketchumh1

customer_reviews.title: where to put my mail
customer_reviews.text: This is great, didn't have a place to put my mail since we did our rooms over and moved desk to another room. Put this on wall in kitchen and I only keep bills in it that have to be paid soon to remind me. Key ring comes in handy when my friend's come over they hang on that in stead of pocket,or purse when their gonna go they just grab off the ring and go.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: ... what I wanted to use it for and looks great in our apartment
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted to use it for and looks great in our apartment. It was somewhat smaller than I expected it to be but that worked out for the best. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & roomy.
customer_reviews.text: This key and mail holder is great! It's mounted on the wall in our bedroom and holds our mail and keys perfectly. It has plenty of room for all of our mail. It looks great and the quality is good too! Would order again and recommend this to anyone looking to organize mail and keys .. great product. Seller delivered ahead of time and it was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Intellighter

customer_reviews.title: Simple & functional
customer_reviews.text: Great key holder, love that it holds mail as well. Very easy to install and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping dog leashes on too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Sturdy, mounted to the wall with no problems, and is quite fashionable hanging next to my door. Plus, it's great to hang the dog's leashes so we aren't always searching the house for them either. I didn't even purchase it for that reason, but we now use it for our dog leashes all the time and it's SO convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Gette

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I ordered this after searching for my keys almost every morning since we always lay them on the counter. It's a perfect oil rubbed bronze color. And I love that it matches my home Decor. It is sturdy and holds up very well, and it fits on my mail perfectly. I would recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Grant

customer_reviews.title: Organization Plus
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this near the front door and is decorative. The men in my house used to throw their keys at the base of the foyer table lamp, so this is a very organized way to leave their keys. I use the top for mail addressed to the sons that have moved out but some of their mail that comes here, I leave in the basket and they know where to look.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: better quality (more solidly constructed) than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I analyze the heck out of even the smallest things on Amazon so many of my reviews are favorable. This is exactly as it looks in size, better quality (more solidly constructed) than I expected, looks nice and is easy to mount on any wall. I love it as it keeps outgoing mail and key clutter off my countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Kenstrodamus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly to keep my dogs leash, my keys, my roommates keys, and other items! We put our mail or coupons up on top and it is perfect. Small, but sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah maddox

customer_reviews.title: Durable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty durable and solid. We needed a place to hang out keys and keep our mail and it works wonderfully for that. The screws for installation aren’t really the best but we got sticky command strips and those hung it beautifully. Definitely serves it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Quality = typical cheap Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Quality = typical cheap Chinese junk. You cannot see in the photo that there is no real back to the pocket and two little screws are what hold it to the wall. Depending upon what you put into it, something could fall thru the open backside. However, it does its job and looks nice. Treat it nicely it should last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Hook broke after a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking key rack with a handy mail slot. To bad that one of the middle hooks broke right off after attempting to hang a set of keys from it. Lame. Returning it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: melhels

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed something cute to hang my keys on, and to put mail in. I wish it had one or two more compartments, but still holds plenty. Comes with what is needed to hang it up. I love the bronze color. Looks great on my wall. It is sturdy, doesn't move around at all. My old wooden shelf would move every time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: christies_classy_beauty

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack ;p  But you need drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small design. The material feels like a woven basket and is sturdy. The hooks are solid. The screws that come with the rack won't properly hold it up. You'll want to get two small plastic wall anchors if you are going to secure to drywall. If you're securing to wood, you're fine. Nice rack :)
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Strong

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks, however, the hole for one of the screws completely detached while screwing into my wall. Also, it was quite difficult to screw into the wall. Overall I like the product, just not as sturdy as it should be
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and meets expectations. The screw holes are just beneath the letter compartment making it a little tight to screw into the wall but it was workable. One of the screws was not scored on top for the screwdriver so I had to find another similar sized screw. Other than these slight inconveniences (which knocked off one star), this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice little item to hold mail and keys
customer_reviews.text: Nice little item to hold mail and keys. It came with hardware and installs in less then a minute. Also holds a purse with no problem. note that it is only as wide as standard piece of mail, very low profile on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: and am pleased with that part
customer_reviews.text: I chose this item for the simplicity, and am pleased with that part. I guess I should have double checked the dimensions, because it is not wide enough to hold standard sized magazines. Overall, I am pleased, but would have preferred something that would hold ALL of my mail.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J. Queen

customer_reviews.title: It's really cute though and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: The screw-area broke off the holder as I was installing it. Fixed it with some gorilla glue, but shows that the construction was a bit flimsy. It's really cute though and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty small so do measurements to make sure it works. But we love it!
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I constantly lose my keys and I wanted something functional but nice looking. We don't have a ton of wall space near our front door so this was perfect. Super easy to install! Looks so sleek and not cheap looking. We bought the bronze finish :) I haven't lost my keys since!!
customer_reviews.author: VS7

customer_reviews.title: this thing looks good and we use it to hold wallets and keys ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing looks good and we use it to hold wallets and keys and work ID badges. Hardware comes attached although I found that adding an extra bracket fastener to the top portion made it more secure. otherwise if not for the slight dangling and improvement with an extra fastener, would have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet elegant! Way to hang up, comes with it’s own matching screws which is a nice bonus. Feels really sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Maheen N.

product_meta.title: iDesign Twillo Metal Wall Mount Corkboard, Key and Mail Rack, 5-Hook Organizer for Kitchen, Mudroom, Hallway, 11.5" x 10.5" x 2.5", Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Corkboard Mail CenterNever lose your keys again with the iDesign Twillo Key and Mail Rack! This 5-hook organizer is made of steel to last for years of quality use. The bronze woven plastic accents are stylish and will match any decor. The rack is great for organizing your keys, leashes, mail, or even hats and small, light-weight bags! Tack reminders or invitations onto the corkboard to never forget any important dates. Installation is easy with all the required hardware included. The organizer is perfect for hanging in your entryway, hallway, mudroom, kitchen, or laundry room. The iDesign Twillo Key and Mail Rack measures 11.5" x 10.5" x 2.5", the ideal size for your home. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: WALL-MOUNTED KEYS AND MAIL RACK: 5-hook wall-mounted organizer for keys, leashes, hats, plastic bags, light-weight bags, and mail all in one convenient place. Ideal for hanging in entryway, mudroom, kitchen, laundry room, or office
DURABLE: Made of steel with a corkboard and bronze woven plastic accents for years of quality use
CORKBOARD INCLUDED: Tack on invitations, save the dates, or any reminders to see before you leave!
EASY INSTALLATION: All wall mounting hardware is included for an easy installation
IDEAL SIZE: Rack measures 11.5" x 10.5" x 2.5", perfect for your home
